definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Is import of tangents supported by this importer.
sentences.chinese: 通过导入器是否支持切线导入。

sentences.english: Circular interpolation of time-sharing algorithm is that circular arc is approached with tangent or chord line.
sentences.chinese: 时间分割法圆弧插补用切线或弦线来逼近圆弧。

sentences.english: Arrowheads on the lines indicate the direction in which the tangent is to be drawn .
sentences.chinese: 电力线上的箭头表示所要画的切线方向。

sentences.english: The graph of a concave function is always below its tangent .
sentences.chinese: 一个凹函数的图象总在它的切线的下方。

sentences.english: Discusses the quadric surfaces and quadric curves that are only applied in engineering, and presents a method of drawing quadric curve tangents.
sentences.chinese: 本文仅对工程上常用的二次曲面的切线作法进行讨论。

sentences.english: The water distribution sprayer adopts counter spray whirl tangent type ABS material.
sentences.chinese: 布水喷头采用对喷旋转切线式ABS材质。

sentences.english: Thus, suggest abandoning the irradiation of pre-auricular portal plus whole neck tangential portal.
sentences.chinese: 建议停用耳前野加全颈切线野的照射方式。

sentences.english: And let's write down the equations of these lines.
sentences.chinese: 下面我们来列出这些切线的方程。

sentences.english: Tangent bulk modulus of soil in the triaxial state of stress was researched.
sentences.chinese: 对三轴应力状态下的土体切线体积模量进行了研究。

sentences.english: Given the algorithm for solving common tangent ball mechanism and network search algorithms.
sentences.chinese: 给出了求解公切线的算法和网络搜索球机制的算法。

sentences.english: The mouth of pants bag should replace transversely line as far as possible with straight-cut line or inclined tangent.
sentences.chinese: 裤袋的开口应尽量以纵切线或斜切线来代替横切线。

sentences.english: The mouth of pants bag should replace transversely line as far as possible with straight-cut line or inclined tangent.
sentences.chinese: 裤袋的开口应尽量以纵切线或斜切线来代替横切线。

sentences.english: So, on the unit circle, F is tangent to the curve.
sentences.chinese: 也就是，在单位圆上，F是曲线的切线。

sentences.english: What is the tangency portfolio in this case?
sentences.chinese: 这个案例中的切线投资组合又是什么呢？

sentences.english: Based on the analysis, determine the unicity of point of tangency and point of intersection.
sentences.chinese: 基于在解析几何的基础上确定了切线和交点的唯一性。

sentences.english: The direction is tangent to the trajectory.
sentences.chinese: 方向就是轨道的切线方向。

definition: axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
